name: Desk Jumper: The Floor is Lava
name_original: Desk Jumper: The Floor is Lava
description:
Desk Jumper is a wacky 2D infinite jumper where the player leaps from desk to desk in an endless sea of lava. It's going to take all the mustache you have to jump and double-jump to the ever-ominous STANDING DESK and avoid a hot, bubbly death. As you progress further, the desks start coming faster and faster so you'll have to control the speed at which you fall in addition to leaping like a lemur. Try to beat the high scores of your friends and family with a local scoreboard.

Fast fun for all ages.
